data.title: MLB spring training is back in Florida! What's with the see-through pants? Here's what to know
data.meta_description: Baseball in Florida looks a little different in 2024 as new uniforms have MLB players and fans angry. Check out each team's spring training schedule.
data.text:
Take me out to the ballgame! Spring training games are back in Florida as Major League Baseball teams prepare for the 2024 season.

For the next five weeks or so, 15 MLB teams will make preseason tours of cities up and down Florida's Atlantic and Gulf coasts. Star players will be getting ready for the long season ahead, and managers will decide on which rookies and veterans will fill out roster spots for Opening Day at the end of March.

In the meantime, baseball fans from Minneapolis and Detroit to Boston and New York will be coming to cities like Fort Myers, Lakeland, West Palm Beach and Port St. Lucie to get an early look at their favorite teams. Will they see a big difference in MLB's new jerseys and pants that's raising such consternation among players?

Spring training schedules: Here's a look at when MLB teams play their last preseason games in Florida

Here's what you need to know about Florida spring training for 2024, including schedules for all 15 teams and how to get tickets.

What is MLB spring training? Why do they call it the Grapefruit League and Cactus League?

Spring training is the preseason for Major League Baseball. The 30 teams gather at various complexes in Florida and Arizona to get ready for the season.

The exhibition games they play are referred to as the Grapefruit League for the 15 teams in Florida and the Cactus League for the 15 in Arizona. Regular MLB players won't play too much during these games, but the intimate stadiums and warm weather make spring training a vacation destination for fans across the country, especially for those looking to escape the cold.

What's going on with the new MLB uniforms? Are the pants really see-through?

The biggest story heading into this baseball season isn't related to the defending champion Texas Rangers, or even with the Los Angeles Dodgers' incredible signing of reigning AL MVP Shohei Ohtani (among other high-priced free agents). Nope, everyone's complaining about the new uniforms.

Long story short, baseball's new Nike Vapor Premier uniforms, which were designed by Nike and made by Fanatics, are not very popular. Players and fans alike have been critical of the quality of the material and stylistic changes, saying the jerseys look like a "replica" jersey, a "T-shirt or a gym shirt" and that "they look cheap." (The official game-worn jerseys cost $430, by the way, while the least expensive official jerseys are $135.) There have been complaints that some of the colors were off from traditional team designs, and the names on the backs of jerseys are significantly smaller.

And that's before we get to the see-through pants.

Tony Clark, executive director of the players union, said the MLBPA is working to resolve the issue in time for Opening Day. Commissioner Rob Manfred has defended the new uniforms, saying "there's going to be some negative feedback" anytime something changes.

What is the spring training schedule for 2024 in Florida?

Spring training starts Saturday, February 24 across Florida. Games will be played every day until Tuesday, March 26. Here's a look at each MLB team spending spring training in Florida with links to their schedules.

Braves spring training

The Atlanta Braves opened spring training at 1:05 p.m. Saturday, February 24 vs. the Tampa Bay Rays in Port Charlotte. Their first game at CoolToday Park in North Port was Sunday, February 25 vs. the Boston Red Sox.

The Braves' last spring training game for 2024 at CoolToday Park is 1:05 p.m. Monday, March 25 vs. the Minnesota Twins.

Check out ticket prices for Braves spring training games. Standing-room tickets for the home opener were $30, while the cheapest seats were $45.

Orioles spring training

The Baltimore Orioles opened spring training at 1:05 p.m. Saturday, February 24 vs. the Boston Red Sox at Ed Smith Stadium in Sarasota.

The Orioles' last spring training game of 2024 at Ed Smith Stadium is 6:05 p.m. Saturday, March 23 vs. the Toronto Blue Jays.

Check out ticket prices for Orioles spring training games. Standing-room tickets for the opener were available for $18, while seats can be found on second-hand ticketing sites such as SeatGeek and VividSeats.

Red Sox spring training

The Boston Red Sox opened spring training at 1:05 p.m. Friday, February 23 vs. Northeastern University at JetBlue Park in Fort Myers. Their first game against an MLB team was Saturday, February 24 vs. the Baltimore Orioles in Sarasota, and their first game against an MLB team at JetBlue Park was Sunday, February 25.

The Red Sox's last spring training game of 2024 at JetBlue Park is 1:05 p.m. Sunday, March 24 vs. the Atlanta Braves.

Check out ticket prices for Red Sox spring training games. The cheapest seats are $22.

Tigers spring training

The Detroit Tigers opened spring training at 1:05 p.m. Saturday, February 24 vs. the New York Yankees at Publix Field at Joker Marchant Stadium in Lakeland.

The Tigers' last spring training game of 2024 at Joker Marchant Stadium is 1:05 p.m. Sunday, March 24 vs. the Tampa Bay Rays.

Check out ticket prices for Tigers spring training games. Standing-room tickets for the opener were $17, while the cheapest seats were $30.

Astros spring training

The Houston Astros opened spring training at 6:05 p.m. Saturday, February 24 vs. the Washington Nationals at CACTI Park of the Palm Beaches in West Palm Beach.

The Astros' last spring training game of 2024 at CACTI Park of the Palm Beaches is 12:05 p.m. Sunday, March 24 vs. the St. Louis Cardinals.

Check out ticket prices for Astros spring training games. Standing-room tickets for the home opener were $20, while the cheapest seats were $30.

Marlins spring training

The Miami Marlins opened spring training at 1:05 p.m. Saturday, February 24 vs. the St. Louis Cardinals at Roger Dean Chevrolet Stadium in Jupiter.

The Marlins' last spring training game of 2024 at Roger Dean Chevrolet Stadium is 1:10 p.m. Sunday, March 24 vs. the New York Mets.

Check out ticket prices for Marlins spring training games. The cheapest seats for the opener were $24.

Twins spring training

The Minnesota Twins opened spring training at 6:05 p.m. Friday, February 23 vs. the University of Minnesota at Hammond Stadium in Fort Myers. Their first game against an MLB team was Saturday, February 24 vs. the Pittsburgh Pirates in Fort Myers.

The Twins' last spring training game of 2024 at Hammond Stadium is 12:05 p.m. Tuesday, March 24 vs. the Atlanta Braves.

Check out ticket prices for Twins spring training games. Standing-room tickets are available for $13, while the cheapest seats are $15.

Mets spring training

The New York Mets opened spring training at 1:10 p.m. Saturday, February 24 vs. the St. Louis Cardinals at Clover Park in Port St. Lucie.

The Mets' last spring training game in 2024 at Clover Park is 1:10 p.m. Sunday, March 24 vs. the Washington Nationals.

Check out ticket prices for Mets spring training games. Standing-room tickets for the opener were $25, while seats can be found on second-hand ticketing sites such as SeatGeek and VividSeats.

Yankees spring training

The New York Yankees opened spring training at 1:05 p.m. Saturday, February 24 vs. the Detroit Tigers in Lakeland. Their first game at Steinbrenner Field in Tampa was Sunday, February 25 vs. the Toronto Blue Jays.

The Yankees' last spring training game of 2024 at Steinbrenner Field is 1:05 p.m. Monday, March 25 vs. the New York Mets.

Check out ticket prices for Yankees spring training games. The cheapest seats for the home opener were available for $55.

Phillies spring training

The Philadelphia Phillies opened spring training at 1:07 p.m. Saturday, February 24 vs. the Toronto Blue Jays in Dunedin. Their first game at BayCare Ballpark in Clearwater was Sunday, February 25 vs. the New York Yankees.

The Phillies' last spring training game of 2024 at BayCare Ballpark is 12:05 p.m. Monday, March 25 vs. the Tampa Bay Rays.

Check out ticket prices for Phillies spring training games. Standing-room tickets for the home opener were $23, while seats can be found on second-hand ticketing sites such as SeatGeek and VividSeats.

Pirates spring training

The Pittsburgh Pirates opened spring training at 1:05 p.m. Saturday, February 24 vs. the Minnesota Twins in Fort Myers. Their first game at LECOM Park in Bradenton was Sunday, February 25 vs. the Baltimore Orioles.

The Pirates' last spring training game of 2024 at LECOM Park is 1:05 p.m. Monday, March 25 vs. the Toronto Blue Jays.

Check out ticket prices for Pirates spring training games. The cheapest seats for the home opener were available for $24.

Cardinals spring training

The St. Louis Cardinals opened spring training at 1:05 p.m. Saturday, February 24 vs. the Miami Marlins at Roger Dean Chevrolet Stadium in Jupiter. They also played at 1:10 p.m. Saturday vs. the New York Mets in Port St. Lucie.

The Cardinals' last spring training game of 2024 at Roger Dean Chevrolet Stadium is 12:05 p.m. Saturday, March 23 vs. the Washington Nationals.

Check out ticket prices for Cardinals spring training games. The cheapest seats for the opener were $24.

Rays spring training

The Tampa Bay Rays opened spring training at 1:05 p.m. Saturday, February 24 vs. the Atlanta Braves at Charlotte Sports Park in Port Charlotte.

The Rays' last spring training game of 2024 at Charlotte Sports Park is 1:05 p.m. Saturday, March 23 vs. the Baltimore Orioles. They close spring training at 12:35 p.m. Tuesday, March 26 vs. the Detroit Tigers at their regular-season home stadium, Tropicana Field in St. Petersburg.

Check out ticket prices for Rays spring training games. Standing-room tickets for the opener were $10, while the cheapest seats were $29.

Blue Jays spring training

The Toronto Blue Jays opened spring training at 1:07 p.m. Saturday, February 24 vs. the Philadelphia Phillies at TD Ballpark in Dunedin.

The Blue Jays' last spring training game of 2024 at TD Ballpark is 1:07 p.m. Saturday, March 23 vs. the Detroit Tigers.

Check out ticket prices for Blue Jays spring training games. Standing-room tickets for the opener were $16, while seats can be found on second-hand ticketing sites such as SeatGeek and VividSeats.

Nationals spring training

The Washington Nationals opened spring training at 6:05 p.m. Saturday, February 24 vs. the Houston Astros at CACTI Park of the Palm Beaches in West Palm Beach.

The Nationals' last spring training game of 2024 at CACTI Park of the Palm Beaches is 6:05 p.m. Saturday, March 23 vs. the Miami Marlins.

Check out ticket prices for Nationals spring training games. Standing-room tickets for the home opener were $20, while the cheapest seats were $30.

When is Opening Day 2024?
